subject: Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: In the P.G.A. Championship, Matt Jones, who has three top-10 finishes on the tour this year, will be joined by Brett Jones, a club pro in New Jersey.
snippet: In the P.G.A. Championship, Matt Jones, who has three top-10 finishes on the tour this year, will be joined by Brett Jones, a club pro in New Jersey.
